title: WTB 5-10 cards on my wants list SGC 40 - 50

posts.post_title: WTB 5-10 cards on my wants list SGC 40 - 50
posts.post_content:
Hello,

Looking to knock a chunk off my wants list as I've come out ahead on last years taxes :D

SGC 40-50 range and hoping to start knocking off the SL'ers and some HOF'ers.  Perhaps a Green Cobb?

I have a larger list of needs so would be easier to email me your list of available cards and then we can go from there.

Thanks!

tps_lewis  AT  comcast  DOT  net

Terry--Email sent on SLers.

Cheers,
Mike
Found two cards, anyone else?  All responded too except you Richard-I'll check that now
